title: New: Island Science – XII
body:
Love the intertwining vocals on this debut single from **Island Science**.

There’s definite comparisons to be made to Sylvan Esso and maybe even some of the more upbeat moments on Hundred Water’s The Moon Rang Like A Bell. Check out _XII_ below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
